404.title: The page you are looking for does not exist.
404.message: You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved.

exceptions.generic: An error occurred, please try again later

users.email-already-in-use: This email or phone number is already in use
users.password-not-set: Log in with your provider and set a password in your account settings first

password.incorrect-current: The current password you entered is incorrect
password.no-password: Create a password for you account first

users.error-sending-email: An unknown error occurred when sending the email, please try again later

validate_email.cooldown-not-lifted: Limited to one verification email every 5 minutes

reset_password.cooldown-not-lifted: Limited to one password reset request every 5 minutes

unknown.saving-user-profile: An error occurred while saving your profile

exceptions.go-back: Go back to the home page
